name: Kupo Coin
description: A special coin that protects Sora from the worst. If your HP drops to 0, it will fully restore health a single time.

name: Potion
description: Restores 80 HP to one teammate. (Equippable)
locations: OLYMPUS: Prize for saving citizens, first visit (2 total)

name: Hi-Potion
description: Restores 160 HP to one teammate. (Equippable)
locations: OLYMPUS: Prize for saving citizens, first visit (1 total)

name: Mega-Potion
description: Restores 160 HP to your whole team. (Equippable)

name: Ether
description: Restores 100 MP to one teammate. If you are recharging MP, this restores half the gauge. (Equippable)
locations: OLYMPUS: Prize for saving citizens, first visit (1 total)
COLLECTOR'S GOAL: Obtain a synthesis material

name: Hi-Ether
description: Fully restores MP to one teammate. If you are recharging MP, this fully restores the gauge. (Equippable)

name: Mega-Ether
description: Fully restores MP to your whole team. (Equippable)

name: Refocuser
description: Restores 40% of the Focus Gauge. (Equippable)

name: Hi-Refocuser
description: Fully restores the Focus Gauge. (Equippable)

name: Panacea
description: Removes all negative status effects from one teammate and provides temporary immunity. (Equippable)
locations: HUNDRED ACRE WOOD: Prize for lowest rank in any of the mini games

name: Elixir
description: Fully restores HP/MP/Focus to one teammate and removes all negative status effects. (Equippable)
locations: BISTRO: Prize for reaching a 3-star rating at the Bistro

name: Megalixir
description: Fully restores HP/MP/Focus to your whole team and removes all negative status effects. (Equippable)

ARENDELLE: Return after this world's story and rebuild Olaf again in the Valley of Ice

name: Tent
description: Fully restores HP/MP/Focus to your whole team. Use this item from the menu.

name: Strength Boost
description: Permanently raises Strength by 1. Use this item from the menu.
locations: TWILIGHT TOWN: Potential Postcard Prize (1 time only)
FLASH TRACER (FRED COURSE): A-rank (first time only)

name: Magic Boost
description: Permanently raises Magic by 1. Use this item from the menu.
locations: TWILIGHT TOWN: Potential Postcard Prize (1 time only)
Flash Tracer (Gogo Course): A-rank (first time only)

name: Defense Boost
description: Permanently raises Defense by 1. Use this item from the menu.
locations: TWILIGHT TOWN: Potential Postcard Prize (1 time only)

name: AP Boost
description: Permanently raises Maximum AP by 1. Use this item from the menu.
